testcase.name: Agent Login Flow â€º Tc_23: Verify Filters list and airline availability after applying filters
testcase.system-out: Starting test: Logging in... Navigating to login page... Waiting for the Agent Login button... Clicking the Agent Login button... Filling login credentials... Submitting login form... Verifying login success message... Login success message verified. Verifying profile name... Profile name verified. Clicking on the Search Icon... Search initiated for flights. Verifying selected "From" and "To" locations... Verified that both "From" and "To" locations are set correctly. Verifying that the flight list is displayed... Flight list displayed for the selected route. Open Airlines filter and apply the "SpiceJet" filter Verify SpiceJet is present Is SpiceJet present after applying filter: [33mtrue[39m Verify Air India is not present Is Air India present after applying filter: [33mfalse[39m Open Airlines filter and uncheck "SpiceJet", then check "Air India" Verify Air India is present Is Air India present after applying filter: [33mtrue[39m Verify SpiceJet is no longer present Is SpiceJet still present after switching to Air India filter: [33mfalse[39m
